ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 91
ygData.msgSnippet: The two ogre heads are used to launch the bloodforge hammer quest.  The npc who takes the heads won t ask for them though...his keywords are broken I think.
ygData.messageBody:
The two ogre heads are used to launch the bloodforge hammer quest. The npc
who takes the heads won't ask for them though...his keywords are broken I
think. The heads are not necessary for the bloodforge quest, you can
complete the quest without them, but you only find out about the quest after
delivering the heads.

I got nothing frm the heads themselves

-----Original Message-----
From: Wayne Sheppard <mrwayne@...>
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 1:04 PM
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Digest Number 91


>From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
>
>> Date: Thu, 15 Jul 1999 12:37:15 PDT

>>Subject: Re: what should i be looking for now?
>>
>>i can't believe u guys don't know about the blackened iron crown that u
can
>>get as a QUEST ITEM at lvl 12....go to butcher block mountains and kill
the
>>2 named trolls...then take there heads to the sheriff in kaladim and DING
u
>>got a crown
>
>
>Trolls? I know of two named Ogres that will roam the area. Never saw any
>Trolls.
>
>And is this the same Blackened Iron Crown found in RunnyEye?
>
>
>Wayne
